scripts.clean: rm -rf api/node_modules api/package-lock.json next/node_modules next/.next next/package-lock.json ooth/node_modules ooth/package-lock.json proxy/node_modules proxy/package-lock.json
scripts.bootstrap: npm install && (cp -n .env.dist .env || true) && (cd api && npm run bootstrap) && (cd next && npm run bootstrap) && (cd ooth && npm run bootstrap) && (cd proxy && npm run bootstrap)
scripts.start:dev-environment: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml up --build db redis
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -n "api,next,ooth,proxy" "cd api && npm run dev" "cd next && npm run dev" "cd ooth && npm run dev" "cd proxy && npm run dev"
